sentences.en: Sedimentation - exhalation siliceous rocks are of great significance in the study of ore deposits.
sentences.cn: 喷流-热水沉积硅质岩对于矿床研究具有重要意义.

sentences.en: The host rock conformably overlies a band of siliceous chertybrecia.
sentences.cn: 含矿主岩整合地上覆于硅质燧石角砾石带之上.

sentences.en: The industry waste slag fly ash or the river sand is used as the siliceous material.
sentences.cn: 工业废渣粉煤灰或河砂一般被用来作为硅质材料.

sentences.en: The main kinds of rocks include carbonate rocks , tuffite, siliceous rocks and quartz sand - stone.
sentences.cn: 主要岩石类型包括碳酸盐岩、沈积凝灰岩 、 矽质岩和石英砂岩.

sentences.en: The Pre - cambrian alumino - siliceous slate is the host rock of antimony deposit inHunan.
sentences.cn: 湖南前寒武系的 硅铝 质板岩是锑矿主要赋矿岩性.

sentences.en: The thin bedded siliceous - rocks include chert and depositional quartz with textures of oolite and pebble.
sentences.cn: 矽质岩包括燧石和沈积石英岩,呈薄层状产出,沈积石英岩具鲕状、砾状结构.

trans.tran_en: of, relating to, or containing abundant silica
